attributes.action: Increase taxes to the top 1% drastically, eradicate taxes to the middle class
attributes.additional_details: This will limit how many billionaires there is - as there shouldn’t be any - as well as 1) acquiring funding to build the UK, 2) help the working class amidst economic disaster, 3) fund the NHS, 4) better the distribution of wealth, and 5) prove to the people that this isn’t an oligarchy.
attributes.background: Increase taxes to the top 1%, crackdown on tax evasion, lower taxes to the middle & working class significantly so only those with incomprehensible & unnecessary amounts of money are affected.

rejection.details:
We understand you would like to increase taxes on the top 1% and remove taxes for the middle classes, but we are not sure which tax you would like to increase and by how much it should be raised. 

You may wish to sign the following petition, which calls for action on a similar matter: 

Introduce a 2% wealth tax on assets over £10 million & tax reform
https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/721409
